summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin Dashboard V2 feature. All 14 backend API tests passed. All frontend tests passed including login, dashboard metrics, filters, tables, and logout.
passed_tests: POST /api/admin/login - Returns access_token with valid credentials
POST /api/admin/login - Returns 401 with invalid credentials
POST /api/admin/register - Returns 403 with wrong admin secret
POST /api/admin/register - Creates account with correct secret (hmrc-admin-secret-2024)
GET /api/admin/stats - Returns 401 without token
GET /api/admin/assessments - Returns 401 without token
GET /api/admin/transactions - Returns 401 without token
GET /api/admin/me - Returns 401 without token
GET /api/admin/stats - Returns metrics (total, paid, conversion, revenue, risk breakdown, industry breakdown)
GET /api/admin/stats - Returns 401 with invalid token
GET /api/admin/assessments - Returns all assessments with correct columns
GET /api/admin/assessments - Industry filter works correctly
GET /api/admin/transactions - Returns all payment transactions
GET /api/admin/me - Returns admin profile
Frontend: Login form displays correctly with username/password inputs
Frontend: Login with admin/admin123 succeeds
Frontend: Dashboard shows metrics (Total=33, Paid=6, Conversion=18.18%, Revenue=£149.94)
Frontend: Risk Distribution shows Low=31, Moderate=2, High=0
Frontend: Top Industries shows PHV/Taxi/Uber=10, Consultant/IT=4, etc.
Frontend: Assessments table shows correct columns (Date, Email, Industry, Year, Turnover, Score, Risk, Status)
Frontend: Payments table shows correct columns (Date, Email, Assessment, Amount, Status, Session ID)
Frontend: Industry filter works (PHV/Taxi shows 10 assessments)
Frontend: Risk band filter works (LOW shows 31 assessments)
Frontend: Payment status filter works (Paid shows 6 assessments with 100% conversion)
Frontend: Clear filters resets to original data
Frontend: Active badge appears when filters applied
Frontend: Logout clears session and returns to login page
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing 33 assessments
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin dashboard fully functional. Login with admin/admin123. Dashboard shows 33 assessments, 6 paid, 18.18% conversion, £149.94 revenue. Filters are client-side (useMemo) and work correctly for industry, risk band, payment status, and date range. All admin endpoints require Bearer token authentication.

features_tested.admin_stats: Working - Returns total, paid, conversion, revenue, risk breakdown, industry breakdown
features_tested.admin_assessments: Working - Returns all assessments with industry filter support
features_tested.admin_me: Working - Returns admin profile (id, username, email)
features_tested.auth_protection: Working - All admin endpoints return 401 without valid token
features_tested.frontend_filters: Working - Industry, risk band, payment status, date range filters all functional
features_tested.frontend_metrics: Working - Stats update when filters applied (client-side filtering)
